name: Yulia Beach Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a deluxe room at Yulia Inn last September 15, 2009 for 2 nights. The room was spacious and clean. Perfect location....restaurants, shops, starbucks and coffee bean are few steps away. It is also very close to the beach, around 4-5 mins walk.
reviews.title: Perfect for Budget Travellers

reviews.text: My only complain is the towels were very and looks dirty beacuse of its collor. If you will stay to this hotel, I recommend to bring yor own towels. The hotel is a bit old and due for renovation and some roof cleaning. In addtion, avoid eating on thier restaurant during peak hours, it will take forever to have your food served. Overall, our experience in Yulia Inn is enjoyable. If you are on a budget and will still want to have a pleasant vacation, Yulia Inn Beach is well recommended.
reviews.title: No complaints. 5 mins walk to the Beach, Hard Rock, Starbucks, Dunkin Donuts...Love it!

reviews.text: Room wise, there's nothing much to shout about. It's kinda "A BUDGET" hotel afterall. Stayed in room 811. Room is clean, sheets & bed very comfy. Though the towels are ok, but if you're particular, bring ur own. Pool is small but just nice to hang out with small group of friends after a day out at the beach surfing. But if you really need to SWIM, just go to Hard Rock and pay for the cabana at around $20 for the whole day. A lil touch of luxury and it's worth it.
reviews.title: I am so disappointed...

reviews.text: Frankly speaking, there are few grades of rooms available here. DO NOT go for their standard room as they are very, very, very old and filthy. Deluxe or super deluxe onwards will do good because they are newer, cleaner and better amenities. Breakfast is simple. Location is good. Getting a taxi around this time of travel, Lebaran holidays, was a nightmare. I waited for at least 30 minutes to get one ! Terrible jam too. If you need a transfer to elsewhere, it's better to get the front desk to pre-book rather than hailing for one at the main road. For the price they charge for their deluxe rooms, it's better to seek elsewhere ! Staffs are quite rude and arrogant, they are not helpful enough.
reviews.title: My honest opinion

reviews.text: A huge thank you to Mr Umar and the Yulia Beach Inn team.
reviews.title: What a wonderful holiday!

reviews.text: The service we experienced was excellent, a really lovely little friendly hotel.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel with perfect location

reviews.text: An oasis in the midst of the hustle and bustle of downtown Kuta.
reviews.title: Happy with my stay!

reviews.text: Also the staff at The Breeze Restaurant were fantastic and breakfast was looked forward to everyday, a great way for us all to start each day.
reviews.title: horrible .. should check your room first!!
Perfect Location and Great Value
reviews.text: Stayed for first time for 8 nights. Asked specially for renovated rooms as there had been mixed reviews about this hotel. Loved the hotel, staff were very helpful and friendly,

reviews.title: cozy retreat
reviews.text: renovated rooms were great. OK the older rooms don't look so great, but you get what you pay for.
The location is fantastic, turn left and you're at the beach or Kuta Square, turn right and
reviews.title: WAY BETTER THAN EXPECTED

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: you walk down to Legian Street. Pool area was lovely and breakfast at The Breeze Restaurant great value with many choices.
reviews.title: Cheap

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Management are thieves!!

description: Yulia Beach Inn is a bungalow type hotel located at the heart of Kuta. It was established in 1972 and since then has maintained a well-deserved reputation for comfort, value-for-money and friendly service.Our rooms and facilities includes 40 fully-equipped rooms where you can enjoy Air Conditioning, hot/cold shower, International channel TV, IDD Phone, and a Mini-bar. We also provide Safety Deposit Box, a Business Centre and a Cafe and Restaurant where you can enjoy our delicious international and local cuisines.
